import { useState } from 'react' import Calendar from './Calendar' import Appointment from './Appointment' import './Panel.css' interface Props { setShowContactPanel: Function; } export default function Panel(props: Props) { const [selectedDate, setSelectedDate] = useState(new Date()) const [clickedInPanel, setClickedInPanel] = useState(false); return (
{if (clickedInPanel) props.setShowContactPanel(false)}}>
setClickedInPanel(true)}>
Book a meeting with me


Meeting context:

{/* Description */}
) }
